summary: The Golden Horde was a powerful kingdom started by Mongols in the 1200s. It was huge, stretching from parts of Europe to Central Asia. At first, it was part of the Mongol Empire but later became its own kingdom. It was also known as the Kipchak Khanate. The Golden Horde had many strong leaders, but after a time, it faced internal fights and invasions. By the 1400s, it started to break into smaller pieces. Eventually, parts of it were taken over by Russia.
title: Golden Horde
